properties.dcterms:title: IRB 1010 Industrial Robot Documentation
properties.dcterms:description: Document detailing the specifications, features, and applications of ABB's IRB 1010 industrial robot, designed for high-precision manufacturing of small electronics and educational use.
properties.dcat:keyword: IRB 1010, ABB, industrial robot, small electronics, wearables, precision, manufacturing, education, OmniCore, Robot Control Mate
properties.dcat:contactPoint: ABB AG, Division Robotics, Grüner Weg 6, 61169 Friedberg, Telefon: +49 6031 85-0, E-Mail: robotics@de.abb.com
properties.creator: ABB AG
properties.conditionsOfOperation: Umgebungstemperatur: +5°C bis +45°C, Relative Luftfeuchtigkeit: max. 95%, Geräuschpegel: max. 70 dB (A)
